line 8 column 1 - Warning: <input> isn't allowed in <body> elements
line 6 column 1 - Info: <body> previously mentioned
line 8 column 1 - Warning: inserting implicit <form>
line 10 column 1 - Warning: <input> attribute with missing trailing quote mark
line 8 column 1 - Warning: missing </form>
Info: Doctype given is "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN"
Info: Document content looks like HTML 4.01 Transitional
Info: No system identifier in emitted doctype
4 warnings, 0 errors were found!

About HTML Tidy: https://github.com/htacg/tidy-html5
Bug reports and comments: https://github.com/htacg/tidy-html5/issues
Or send questions and comments to: https://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/public-htacg/
Latest HTML specification: http://dev.w3.org/html5/spec-author-view/
Validate your HTML documents: http://validator.w3.org/nu/
Lobby your company to join the W3C: http://www.w3.org/Consortium
